Posts.Content: I have this white pearly looking growth on my breast. Actually it's on my nipple area. I am on a schedule to return in a few months to check on the progression of two lumps in the same breast. There is no pain or discharge in this new area. Should I reschedule sooner with the surgeon.
Posts.Title: Strange looking white growth on my nipple

Posts.Content: How are you doing? My thoughts are with you. Thank you for the b-day wishes. It was a quiet one. My appointment was rescheduled so I'm still waiting. Take care of your self.
Posts.Title: waiting for biopsy

Posts.Content: I'm praying for you. You will get through this. I good friend is 3 years out after being diagnosed with triple negative. She had such a positive outlook. She is doing well and is cancer free. I go Friday for my mammogram, the day after my birthday. Hugs to you.
Posts.Title: waiting for biopsy

Posts.Content: I can imagine your anxiety. I am just waiting for a mammogram and that is driving me crazy. Hope all is well with your results. Positive thoughts your way.
Posts.Title: waiting for biopsy

Posts.Content: I went for a mammogram. Had to have an ultrasound as well. I get the results in about a week. The only difference with this mammogram was that they didn't tell me know changes like they did last time. I have a couple of autoimmune disorders that I get regular treatment. One of the side effects is that it does slightly increase the chance of getting cancer. I can wait for the results. My husband and I have talked about it a couple of years ago after two friends died from BC and a third was diagnosed. I told him hands down a mastectomy for sure. No I'm not jumping the gun here. But over the last few years I've been faced with some scary medical decisions. Thanks for letting me get this off my mind.
Posts.Title: I know, don't get anxious

Posts.Content: How long did some of you have to wait before you found out that more testing needed to be done? Waiting is not something I do well anymore.
Posts.Title: I know, don't get anxious

Posts.Content: Got word today that I have a referral to a surgeon. Now the waiting game begins.
Posts.Title: I know, don't get anxious
